law.catch_line: Short title for KRS 139.536 and KRS 148.851 to 148.860.
law.text: KRS 139.536 and KRS 148.851 to 148.860 shall be known as the Kentucky Tourism Development Act.
law.history: Repealed, reenacted, and amended 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 7, effective June 21, 2001. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 335, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1996.

metadata.lrc-note: (1/25/2009). This is former KRS 154.29-060 as amended by 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 7, and renumbered by the Reviser of Statutes under KRS 7.136(1).
